<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===------------ BPFCheckAndAdjustIR.cpp - Check and Adjust IR -----------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check IR and adjust IR for verifier friendly codes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following are done for IR checking:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - no relocation globals in PHI node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following are done for IR adjustment:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - remove &#95;&#95;builtin&#95;bpf&#95;passthrough builtins. Target independent IR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     optimizations are done and those builtins can be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - remove llvm.bpf.getelementptr.and.load builtins.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - remove llvm.bpf.getelementptr.and.store builtins.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - for loads and stores with base addresses from non-zero address space</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     cast base address to zero address space (support for BPF address spaces).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpfcore-h">BPFCORE.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BPFCheckAndAdjustIR::checkIR(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure relocation global won&#39;t appear in PHI node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This may happen if the compiler generated the following code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   B1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      g1 = @llvm.skb&#95;buff:0:1...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      goto B&#95;COMMON</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   B2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      g2 = @llvm.skb&#95;buff:0:2...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      goto B&#95;COMMON</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   B&#95;COMMON:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      g = PHI(g1, g2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      x = load g</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If anything likes the above &quot;g = PHI(g1, g2)&quot;, issue a fatal error.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armlowoverheadloops-cpp/#a3bf42baf773b375802538951c88d8e12">ToRemove</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do the following transformation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   x &lt; min(a, b) -&gt; x &lt; a &amp;&amp; x &lt; b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   x &gt; min(a, b) -&gt; x &gt; a || x &gt; b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   x &lt; max(a, b) -&gt; x &lt; a || x &lt; b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   x &gt; max(a, b) -&gt; x &gt; a &amp;&amp; x &gt; b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Such patterns are introduced by LICM.cpp:hoistMinMax()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation and might lead to BPF verification failures for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// older kernels.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To minimize &quot;collateral&quot; changes only do it for icmp + min/max</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls when icmp is inside a loop and min/max is outside of that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verification failure happens when:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - RHS operand of some &#96;icmp LHS, RHS&#96; is replaced by some RHS1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - verifier can recognize RHS as a constant scalar in some context;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - verifier can&#39;t recognize RHS1 as a constant scalar in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   context;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The &quot;constant scalar&quot; is not a compile time constant, but a register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that holds a scalar value known to verifier at some point in time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// during abstract interpretation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See also:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   https://lore.kernel.org/bpf/20230406164505.1046801-1-yhs@fb.com/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BPFCheckAndAdjustIR::sinkMinMax(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wrap ToWrap with cast to address space zero:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if ToWrap is a getelementptr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   wrap it&#39;s base pointer instead and return a copy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if ToWrap is Instruction, insert address space cast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   immediately after ToWrap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if ToWrap is not an Instruction (function parameter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   or a global value), insert address space cast at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   beginning of the Function F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - use Cache to avoid inserting too many casts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428" lineLink="#a90036e9bed7ce7e86007bd8d83dd2d21"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a90036e9bed7ce7e86007bd8d83dd2d21">aspaceWrapValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Cache, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ToWrap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = Cache.find(ToWrap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != Cache.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It-&gt;getSecond();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GetElementPtrInst&gt;</a>(ToWrap)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Support for BPF address spaces:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - for each function in the module M, update pointer operand of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   each memory access instruction (load/store/cmpxchg/atomicrmw)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   by casting it from non-zero address space to zero address space, e.g:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (load (ptr addrspace (N) %p) ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     -&gt; (load (addrspacecast ptr addrspace (N) %p to ptr))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - assign section with name .addr&#95;space.N for globals defined in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   non-zero address space N</span></CodeLine>
